text: Þis his brydancumbes land boc þe æþelstan cing gebocode þam hiþum at Wiltune for hine & for eadflede his swistor on eche yrfe.
Þis syndon þa land gemæro æt Brydancumbe.
Of noddre staþe up ofer east cumb swa se stan hrycg scyt ut to þan hæþanne byrgelse.
Þonne west andlang hricges swa se herepoþ sceat to þam beorge to scorte hryþrum.
Þonne forþ be yfre oþ hringwoldes treow.
Þonne andlang herpoþes in on beorge.
Forð þonne andlang streames oþ oxnaford.
Þonne þær ofer on ane lake.
Þonne andlang lake eft in on noddre.
